text: Fearless Vampire Killers is a 1967 American British horror comedy movie. It was directed by Roman Polanski (who also stars). Other actors include Jack MacGowran, Sharon Tate, Ronald Lacey, Alfie Bass, Ferdy Mayne, and Terry Downes. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 comedy movies Category:1967 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:British horror movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Roman Polanski
title: Fearless Vampire Killers
